UCR Alumni Association See More triangle-down Places Riverside, California UCR UCDC Academic Internship Program English (US)  ·  Español  ·  Português (Brasil)  ·  Français (France)  ·  Deutsch Privacy  ·  Terms  ·  Advertising  ·  Ad Choices  ·  Cookies  ·  More  Facebook © 2021 Photos See All Videos Winter 2018 Ariya Haghighat Video 2 Matthew Yamamoto - UCDC Intern Fall 2015 2 Andrew Sall - Fall UCDC Participant 8 See All Posts UCR UCDC Academic Internship Program August 12, 2020  ·  Worried about getting an internship during this global pandemic?  Have no fear because UCDC is (remotely) here!  We are happy to announce a remote option for UCDC as a way to gain experience in federal agencies, nonprofit organizations, and advocacy groups from the comfort of your own home. The Winter 2021 application deadline will be September 1st. Please visit our website (link in bio) for more information.   # ucdc   # ucr   # firstgen   # engageucr UCR UCDC Academic Internship Program June 11, 2020  ·  We have an informational interview with one of the 1st remote participants for the UCCS program. Wendy Rincon is a 3rd year Bioengineering major, recipient of the Health Justice Scholarship, and an intern for the CCST (California Council on Science and Technology). She gives us some insight on the first virtual UCCS quarter ever. She gives some advice on managing an internship and school, how she applied, program expectations, and her own experience with her internship in how it has benefited her and much more. To view this informational interview, visit  ucdc.ucr.edu  or click this link:  http://ow.ly/NQS850A5y0u See All See More
